title: The baiting of the Popes bull. Or an vnmasking of the mystery of iniquity, folded vp in a most pernitious breeue or bull, sent from the Pope lately into England, to cawse a rent therein, for his reentry With an advertisement to the Kings seduced subiects. By H.B.
author: Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.
publicationStmtPublisher: By W[illiam] I[ones, Augustine Mathewes, John Jaggard? and others?] for Michaell Sparke,
